scenario.name: Subscribe
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:resource@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "alice" <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:resource@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Contact: "alice" <sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: 3600 Max-Forwards: 70 Event: message-summary Accept: application/pidf+xml Content-Length: 0
